description: This is an '__init__.py' file for an API authentication module, importing and exposing various authentication-related classes and functions from internal modules 'jwt_handler' and 'oauth'.

classes.name: TokenData
classes.description: Holds token data extracted from a JWT token.

classes.name: OAuthState
classes.description: Represents OAuth state information for security purposes.

methods.name: create_access_token
methods.description: Generates a new access token based on provided data.

methods.name: verify_token
methods.description: Verifies the validity of a given token.

methods.name: jira_oauth
methods.description: Starts or manages OAuth process for JIRA.

methods.name: confluence_oauth
methods.description: Starts or manages OAuth process for Confluence.
